title: Grab the Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones for $350 with this Deal!
description: Sony's premium headphones pack great sound and comfort. The post Grab the Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones for $350 with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Sony's premium headphones pack great sound and comfort.
text: Sony’s premium wireless audio products are among some of the best that you can get right now, and headphones such as the WH-1000XM4 and XM5 are great examples of this. Speaking of the latter, Sony’s current flagship noise cancelling headphones are currently on sale, going for as low as 18% off. in terms of what you get, the XM5 headphones come with a refined design, in addition to signature features such as impressive active noise cancelling, up to 30 hours of playtime with built-in fast charging, support for touch controls, multi-point connectivity, as well as an integrated V1 processor for improved sound. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
Sony’s premium wireless audio products are among some of the best that you can get right now, and headphones such as the WH-1000XM4 and XM5 are great examples of this. Speaking of the latter, Sony’s current flagship noise cancelling headphones are currently on sale, going for as low as 18% off.

in terms of what you get, the XM5 headphones come with a refined design, in addition to signature features such as impressive active noise cancelling, up to 30 hours of playtime with built-in fast charging, support for touch controls, multi-point connectivity, as well as an integrated V1 processor for improved sound.
